Ben Leskey's Blog: website website posts from Ben Leskey https://benleskey.com/blog/tags/website en-us 2023 Ben Leskey Thu, 16 Mar 2023 18:20:44 +0000 Thu, 16 Mar 2023 18:20:44 +0000
Raymon Ortega #1: Would-be Wizard I’m starting a new Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead (CDDA) game, and I thought’d be cool to document my adventures. Maybe it’ll force me to play more thoughtfully, not falling victim to that classic killer of permadeath roguelikes: Hubris. Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Struggle to survive in a harsh, persistent, procedurally generated world. Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a… gamesletsplaycddacdda_raymon https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_1 https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_1 Sun, 29 Jan 2023 12:00:00 +0000
